title: Admission open to all & eligibility
text: Admissions open irrespective of caste, class, creed, gender or nationality; based on merit and eligibility criteria published by the University and prospectus; provisional offers withdrawn if fees/documents not submitted on time.

title: Reservation & relaxations
text: Reservation follows West Bengal Dept. of Higher Education; 5% relaxation in marks for reserved categories (except School of Law).

title: Placement eligibility
text: Minimum 75% attendance required to be eligible for internships/placements; students penalized in disciplinary cases will not receive placement support.

title: Eligibility & assessment
text: Medium of instruction/exams is English; minimum 75% attendance to appear (see exceptions); students must submit exam form online with fees; passing requires >=40% in both CIA and TEE for each course; CIA:40% TEE:60%.
